description: This is the main source code for a FastAPI backend API managing notes, including CRUD endpoints, health check, and database setup.

classes.name: HealthResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model for health check response containing status, service, and version.

methods.name: HealthResponse health_check()
methods.description: Endpoint to verify service health and metadata.

methods.name: NoteOut create_note(payload: NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new note entry in the database.

methods.name: List[NoteOut] list_notes( page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="1-based page index"), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100, description="Number of items per page"), q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search query against title and content"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of notes with optional search.

methods.name: NoteOut get_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: NoteOut update_note(note_id: int, payload: NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID.

methods.name: Response delete_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

ctags.name: create_note
ctags.pattern: /^def create_note(payload: NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> NoteOut:$/

ctags.name: delete_note
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> Response:$/

ctags.name: get_note
ctags.pattern: /^def get_note(note_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> NoteOut:$/

ctags.name: list_notes
ctags.signature: ( page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="1-based page index"), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100, description="Number of items per page"), q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search query against title and content"), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.pattern: /^def update_note(note_id: int, payload: NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)) -> NoteOut:$/
ctags.signature: (note_id: int, payload: NoteUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
